name: Solitaire Forever
description:
Enjoy over 150 solitaire games in HD. Rich graphics and smooth animation enhance your game-play experience in 3D. Here's just a few of the many games included: Baker's Dozen, Beleaguered Castle, Canfield, Eight off, Flower Garden, Forty Thieves, Freecell, Golf, Klondike, La Belle Lucie, Miss Milligan, Montana, Monte Carlo, Osmosis, Pyramid, Scorpion, Spider, The Towers, Tripeaks, Westcliff, Yukon, and so many more. Features include:

- Tilts to any orientation, on any size cell phone or tablet
- Over 150 games (displays over 230 known names)
- Cards that move and flip in 3D space
- Multiple card decks and card backs
- Auto-saved game state
- Unlimited undo and redo, with a touch-and-drag slider control
- Move cards with one-touch, two-touch, or touch and drag
- Auto-play and auto-flip options
- One-touch hint to reveal available moves
- Built-in rules for each game help you to discover new favorites
